entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
